column5: Guys, Amazon.ca has deal of the day: Big Buddy Heater for $78.12 https://www.amazon.ca/Mr-Heater-MH18B-Buddy-Propane/dp/B000JT7IGQ/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1511314423&sr=8-1&keywords=buddy+heater Never saw this kind of price for best heater on the market. I hope some one will take advantage of this deal.
Tried to buy one, not available at that price now even though it's still listing it at that price.  Thanks for posting nonetheless, they wouldn't last long for that kind of money.
holy crepe thats cheap.  I got my little buddy last year Sail had them on for $80, and Canadian Tire offers 10% canadian tire money on price matches so i did ok!
I bought one yesterday good deal delivered to my house
That will keep you warm in the DOG house.
i blew up the old one.    shut up don't ask lol
Stop refilling. When will you learn...............
brand new one, hooked it up.... lite...... it flame on...flame everywhere
These appear to be on sale again today using the link in the original post, 45% off.
